about_the_game:
Everseeker is a Hidden Object game and a charming experience of exploration and discovery, where your goal is to find 20 small insects hidden in a picturesque village of adorable bunnies. All the art is carefully hand-drawn, providing a relaxing and immersive atmosphere.

Take some time for yourself and dive into this wonderful world. We all need a break from time to time, and there's nothing better than a calm and charming game to help us unwind. We hope to see you soon <3

FEATURES

  • 20 creatures to find
  • Hidden secrets
  • Beautifully hand-drawn scenery
  • Controller support

CUSTOMIZATION

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later, SteamOS
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA or PulseAudio compatible

  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel. 64-bit processor and operating system.

  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 160 MB available space
  • Sound Card: CoreAudio compatible
